import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; const Movie = () => { const location = useLocation(); const id = location.pathname.slice(7); const [movie, setMovie] = React.useState(""); React.useEffect(() => { axios .get(`/api/movies/${id}`) .then((re) => re.data) .then((data) => setMovie(data)); }, ""); const handlerClick = () => { axios .put("/api/favorites/addToFavorites", { imdbID: id, }) .then(() => alert("Agregado exitosamente")); }; return ( <>
